email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I hope you're doing well. We have a spot enquiry for 50,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai. The vessel available is the OCEAN BREEZE, DWT 75,000, LOA 225m. The starting freight quote is USD 25.50 per MT on CIF terms.

Let me know if you're interested and if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high given the current market. Could you provide more details on the laycan and the demurrage rate?

Best,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

The laycan is flexible, but we are targeting a loading window starting around 2023-10-20. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day.

Regarding the rate, we believe it is competitive, but we are open to discussions. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Thank you for the additional details. Considering the current market conditions, we would be more comfortable with a rate of USD 24.00 per MT. Also, could you confirm the laycan as 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

We can agree to a revised freight quote of USD 24.50 per MT. The laycan is confirmed as 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Laura,

USD 24.50 per MT works for us. Please send over the recap and we will proceed with the shipment.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Great! I will send over the recap shortly. Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura
